== Penha-de-Franca (CT) (626701) ==

Penha-de-Franca (CT) is a town in the [[BARDEZ 002]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 5.42 sq. km. and harbouring 3850 households with total population of 15342 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 4 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 4 km. Male population is 7816 and female population is 7526. Scheduled Caste population is 433 and Scheduled Tribes population is 143. Census Location Code of the town is 626701<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 165 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 475 km. Railway station is at CARAMBOLIM at a distance of 14 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open and closed drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 4300 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at PANAJI (4 km) .
